import { useSelector } from "react-redux" import styles from '../../styles/Cart.module.css' import { sumBy } from "../../utils/common" const Cart = () => { const { cart } = useSelector(({ user }) => user) return (

Your cart

{!cart.lengtjh ? (
Here is empty
) : ( <>
{cart.map((item) => { const {title,id,images,category,price,quantity} = item return (

{title}

{item.name}
{price}$
{quantity}
{price * quantity}$
) })}
TOTAL PRICE: {' '} {sumBy(cart.map())} $
)}
) } export default Cart
